attributes.action: change the name of 'Good Friday' to 'Great Friday'!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Good Friday is great in many ways, not least because many people are able to have a period of 4 days away from work without the need to use any annual leave.

With this in mind, I feel that Good Friday is indeed, great. It should therefore be re-named in order to fully reflect its greatness.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
